title: MrDave
author: MrDave
content: LTC, LINK, BNB can surge high this week. Am I taking the correct names? Your thoughts guys?

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: I hope that BNB, COS, LINK, SPELL, can provide significant movements for at least the next 3 weeks, so that there is a good moment to take profits every day or hour, if those 4 do not move then another solution is to look for other coins..

comments.author: rugrats
comments.body: Almost everything depends on bitcoin. Not just these 3 coins, but I think all altcoins in the market will go up if bitcoin goes up, and if bitcoin goes down then none of the coins will rise. LTC, out of the 3 altcoins you mentioned, I think if the market keeps going up then maybe LTC is the slowest rising altcoin, that's my prediction.

comments.body: Take profits, that's the best advice I can give right now, leave the rest for whatever may come up but you are already prepared, I am not a fan of LTC because its slowish but yeah BNB and Link are good, you can add Matic instead.

comments.author: Rimueng
comments.body: No one knows for sure whether the price of altcoins such as LTC, LINK and BNB will soar high this week because the price movement of altcoins depends on bitcoin. When the price of bitcoin rose significantly like last year, almost all altcoins also rose significantly such as ETH, BNB where these two altcoins set ATH records last year.
